holy.description:
[Basic Attack]:Deals [Damage Rate: 90%] Magic Damage.

Can cast [Holy Feather] every 5s.
Deals [Damage Rate: 150%] Magic Damage to the target
and heals [Healing Rate: 75%] HP for up to 3 allies within
14m

Replaces Basic Attack with [Holy Smite].
After a 0.5s cast, calls down holy smite at the target
location, dealing [Damage Rate: 80%] Magic Damage to
all players ([Damage Rate: 160%] Magic Damage to
mobs). Heals the caster for [Healing Rate: 48%] HP if
hitting at least one enemy.

Replaces Basic Attack with [Holy Heal].
After a 1.5s cast, performs holy healing at the target
location, restoring [Healing Rate: 90%] HP allies in range.
Increases the resistances of allies within 9m by 15%

Projects a holy wave in the target direction, dealing
[Damage Rate: 200%] Magic Damage to all players
([Damage Rate: 300%] Magic Damage to mobs) in its
path. The wave automatically returns when reaching max
range, healing up to 5 nearby allies for [Healing Rate:
75%] HP.

Channels divine link on target for 6s, also granting the
caster [Target-based Max HP 15%] Shield for 4s. Can
move slowly while channeling.
When targeting an ally, heals them for [Healing Rate:
100%] HP every second.
When targeting an enemy, deals [Damage Rate: 100%]
Magic Damage every second.

Projects holy energy at the target location. On impact,
restores [Healing Rate: 75%] HP and grants a
[Target-based Max HP 20%] shield for 4s to allies in
range.

Creates multiple holy walls in front. Enemies who touch
them take [Damage Rate: 150%] Magic Damage and are
stunned for 1.5s, while the caster gains 
[Target-based Max HP 12%] Shield for 6s, stacking up to 4 times.

Cleanses all Slow and Immobilize effects and 2 Debuff
effects from the caster and up to 20 nearby allies and
restores [Healing Rate: 100%] HP. Also prevents the next 3
Immobilize and Immune to Slow effects within 4s.

Grants a shield of [Target-based Max HP 25%] to the
caster or an ally for 4s.
When the shield breaks, deals [Damage Rate: 250%] Magic
Damage to nearby enemies

Leaps to the target location. Upon landing, deals
Damage Rate: 300%] Magic Damage to enemies in range
and knocks them up for 0.75s. Heals allies in range for
[Healing Rate: 150%] HP and increases their Dodge by
30% for 6s.

Launches a Holy Chain that bounces to the nearest allied
target within 9 meters after hitting an ally, restoring
[Healing Rate: 100%] HP with each hit. It deals 
[Damage Rate: 100%] Magic Damage to up to 5 enemy targets in
range, with damage reduced to 20% for subsequent
explosions.
The chain can bounce up to 9 times, and each target can
be hit a maximum of 3 times.

Creates a holy domain that deals [Damage Rate: 300%]
Magic Damage to enemies in range and knocks them back
10m. Channels for 3s, healing allies in range for 
[Healing Rate: 50%] HP every 0.5s and increasing their Damage
Resistance by 10% for 6s. Stacks up to 3 times.

Casts holy radiance at the target location. Heals allies in
range for [Healing Rate: 100%] HP and deals 
[Damage Rate: 300%] Magic Damage to enemies, knocking them
back 7m from the center. Gives enemies 60% chance to
miss Basic Attacks and reveals Stealth for 6s.

Creates a Blessed Halo at the target location. After 1s,
heals all allies in range for [Healing Rate: 300%] HP,
cleanses all control effects and 5 debuffs, and grants
immunity to Control and Slow for 4s.

Cleanses an ally or the caster of all Slow and Immobilize
effects, heals [Healing Rate: 300%] HP and grants
Sanctuary for 5s.
Sanctuary grants immunity to Slow and Immobilize, and
prevents HP from falling below 1. Each 10% of missing
HP increases healing received by 5%.
Sanctuary cannot be dispelled.
